author: Special Correspondent
text:
Collector V. Rajaraman, accompanied by Superintendent of Police P. Aravindan, inspected two centres where votes polled in Virudhunagar district in the forthcoming Assembly election are to be counted.

Mr. Rajaraman inspected Virudhunagar S. Vellaichamy Nadar Polytechnic College and Virudhunagar Hindu Nadar Senthikumara Nadar College to assess the arrangements made for counting of votes.

Votes polled in Rajapalayam and Srivilliputtur Assembly constituencies will be counted at VHNSN College.

Counting for Sattur, Sivakasi, Virudhunagar, Aruppukottai and Tiruchuli constituencies will be taken up at the polytechnic college, according to an official press release.
title: Collector inspects counting centres
